snippet: An interactive public art installation in Detroit has been the site of eight suspicious fires since May, The Associated Press reported.
abstract: Heidelberg Project, interactive public art installation in Detroit, has been the site of eight suspicious fires since May, causing investigators to wonder why the project has become a target.
lead_paragraph: An interactive public art installation in Detroit has been the site of eight suspicious fires since May, The Associated Press reported.

headline.print_headline: Fire Investigation At Detroit Art Site
headline.main: Fire Investigation at Detroit Art Site
